description: The Apple Cider Mule is a fall-themed Moscow Mule. This is the perfect alcoholic drink for those cool autumn nights. You've got to have just enough cider so you can taste its sweet flavor but not too much else dilutes it and takes away from the vodka's kick!
name: Apple Cider Mule
recipeIngredient: Lime wedge, thyme sprig or apple slice, sprinkle of cinnamon for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a Moscow mule cup, pour vodka, apple cider, and lime juice with ice. Stir well until properly combined.
recipeInstructions.text: In a Moscow mule cup, pour vodka, apple cider, and lime juice with ice. Stir well until properly combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with a lime wedge and a thyme sprig or apple slice. If desired, sprinkle with a tiny hint of cinnamon.
